report.title: External taxon keys for a scratchpad
report.description: Lists external keys for all taxa identified by a scratchpad list. Includes hierarchical children. Designed to link to the [sensitivity scratchpad] control on a data entry form.
report.query: SELECT DISTINCT #columns# FROM scratchpad_list_entries sle JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON cttl.id=sle.entry_id JOIN cache_taxon_paths ctp ON ctp.path @> ARRAY[cttl.taxon_meaning_id] JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttlany ON cttlany.external_key=ctp.external_key WHERE sle.scratchpad_list_id=#scratchpad_list_id#

param.name: scratchpad_list_id
param.description: ID of the scratchpad list to load
